name: Applied Direct Services Corporation (ADSC)
tag_list: lead-demand-generation, lead-generation, marketing, analysis, business-intelligence, data-warehousing, erp, sales, infrastructure, out-sourcing--balanced-score-card, quality-assurance-
overview:
Advanced marketing communications group, that can help companies in complex selling situations to get further, faster. This group tackles some of the complex last mile issues, that plague many technology & other complex selling type companies.

ADSC provides serious lead demand generation services, market & marketing analysis, including data mining, & other forms of advanced analysis, training, & mentoring up to & including redesigning entire sales cycles.

Strongly methodology based, the group has advanced quality assurance capabilities designed for the sales & marketing cycle business processes.

Originally, they were only oriented towards technology groups. The group has entered into actual distribution, with it’s Focused Channel Division. It provides deep & complete services including all of the services of the ADSC Division, & others, to VAR’s. Focused Channel distributes a number of things, from ERP to call center technologies, with many core offerings, in between. Things that help companies to better be able to sell and/make a profit while they do.

With it’s latest Division Open Opportunity, ADSC also provides these kinds of services, & other sell cycle enabling capabilities, beyond just the Technology Industry, into a number of serious complex selling based industries.
